function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of physical activity due to quarantine and social isolation.","Impact":"Increased risk of physical and mental health issues, including stress, anxiety, and depression.","Mitigation":"Encouraging regular home-based exercises and physical activities.","Technologies":"Online exercise platforms, fitness apps, and virtual personal trainers.","People":"Adults and individuals in quarantine or social isolation.","Owner":"Health organizations, fitness professionals, and individuals themselves."},{"Description":"Overexertion and injury from improper exercise technique or excessive activity.","Impact":"Increase in injuries and physical strain, leading to long-term health issues.","Mitigation":"Providing guidance on proper exercise techniques and intensity, and encouraging gradual progression.","Technologies":"Fitness apps, virtual personal trainers, and video tutorials.","People":"Adults engaging in home-based exercises.","Owner":"Fitness professionals, healthcare providers, and individuals themselves."},{"Description":"Lack of motivation to engage in regular exercise due to social isolation and quarantine.","Impact":"Decline in physical fitness, mental well-being, and overall health.","Mitigation":"Creating social support networks, setting achievable goals, and scheduling regular virtual exercise sessions.","Technologies":"Online communities, virtual training groups, and fitness tracking apps.","People":"Adults and individuals in quarantine or social isolation.","Owner":"Health and fitness organizations, mental health professionals, and individuals themselves."}]}
